sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; const Sidebar = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); // Manage sidebar visibility state const sidebarRef = useRef(null); // Reference for the sidebar element const toggleButtonRef = useRef(null); // Reference for the toggle button const toggleSidebar = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); // Toggle the state between true and false }; useEffect(() => { const handleClickOutside = (event) => { // Check if the click is outside the sidebar and toggle button if ( sidebarRef.current && !sidebarRef.current.contains(event.target) && toggleButtonRef.current && !toggleButtonRef.current.contains(event.target) ) { setIsOpen(false); // Close the sidebar } }; // Add event listener for clicks on the document document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside); // Cleanup event listener on component unmount return () => { document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside); }; }, []); return (
{/* Toggle Button */} {/* Sidebar */}

    Medical advanced platform

  • Dashboard
  • Inventory
  • procurement
  • Quotes
  • Orders
  • Finance
  • Communication
  • Communication Pro
) } export default Sidebar
